ground_truth_reviews.comment: The code attempts to access `found_post.author_email` before verifying that `found_post` is not `None`. If the post lookup fails, `found_post` will be `None`, leading to an `AttributeError`. This will cause an unhandled server error instead of the intended `PostNotFoundException`. The null check should be performed immediately after the loop, before any attributes of `found_post` are accessed.

title: feat: Add special handling for admin posts
body: This change introduces logic to handle posts authored by admins differently. Currently, it's a placeholder for future enhancements.
